⊣ d(hs0, c0 ∈ CHil)

comment: Corollary of the Projection Theorem: A subcomplex Hilbert space is a Hilbert space (in the algebraic sense, meaning that all algebraically closed subspaces have a projection decomposition). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2015.)
